item.title: How to use the browser in Windows as WSL's default
item.description: How do you usually do when you need to authorize using the browser in WSL? Copy the token? Or use WSLg? These ways are not wrong, but it will be better to use the host’s browser. Here is how to set it: sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/x-www-browser x-www-browser path/to/browser priority Example:

item.title: Permission denied when using Gitpod with self-made Dockerfile
item.description: When you use Gitpod, you can use gitpod/workspace-full. It is enough for development most case. However, I’d like to use a morphological analysis engine called MeCab with Golang, so I tried to use an image I’ve created in advance. However, I got stuck on permission, so I’m writing this article.

item.title: How to replace home directory with "~" on PowerShell
item.description: PowerShell displays the current full path by default. It’s long, so I’d like to replace it with ~ like Bash. Prepare a profile You can customize your PowerShell with $profile. It doesn’t exist by default, so you need to run touch $profile. Customize To customize the prompt, use function prompt. Here is a built-in one.
